thread.title: Search underway after police dog goes missing
thread.title_full: Search underway after police dog goes missing

author: Roberto Acosta | racosta1@mlive.com
title: Search underway after police dog goes missing
text: A statement on the Grand Blanc Township police Facebook about 9 p.m. Feb. 8 stating a resident who is also a Michigan State Police K-9 handler notified the department his partner, a German Sheperd, had left his property in the area of East Hill Road and Interstate 75.A statement on the Grand Blanc Township police Facebook about 9 p.m. Feb. 8 stating a resident who is also a Michigan State Police K-9 handler notified the department his partner, a German Sheperd, had left his property in the area of East Hill Road and Interstate 75.
